body_html:
@ezyang Yeah, i rewrote arange instead of changing range cause I think fmod is actually causing error in some cases.

Also, I looked at the numpy implementation and it looks like nmp_ceil is just calls C99 ceil, which I decided to use here.

body:
@ezyang Yeah, i rewrote arange instead of changing range cause I think fmod is actually causing error in some cases.

Also, I looked at the numpy implementation and it looks like nmp_ceil is just calls C99 ceil, which I decided to use here.
